  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_92895</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_92895</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="fr">La pesanteur maintient le système solaire</string>
            <string language="en">Gravity holds the solar system together</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schwerkraft hält das Solarsystem zusammen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A gravidade prende o sistema solar junto</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La gravità tiene insieme il sistema solare</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η βαρύτητα κρατά το ηλιακό σύστημα από κοινού</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La gravedad mantiene la Sistema Solar unida</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Cette illustration prouve que sans la pesanteur, les  planètes dans le système solaire ne peuvent pas continuer à orbiter autour du soleil.</string>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that without gravity, the planets in the Solar System cannot continue to orbit around the Sun.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">pesanteur</string>
            <string language="en">gravity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">orbite</string>
            <string language="en">Orbit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">planètes</string>
            <string language="en">Planets</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">système solaire</string>
            <string language="en">solar system</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">le soleil</string>
            <string language="en">sun</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß ohne Schwerkraft, die 
Planeten im Solarsystem nicht fortfahren können, um die Sonne in 
Umlauf zu bringen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que sem gravidade, os 
planetas no sistema solar não podem continuar a orbitar em torno do 
sol.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica che senza gravità, i 
pianeti nel sistema solare non possono continuare ad orbitare intorno 
a intorno al sole.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι χωρίς βαρύτητα, οι 
πλανήτες στο ηλιακό σύστημα δεν μπορούν να συνεχίσουν να βάζουν 
σε τροχιά γύρω από τον ήλιο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que sin gravedad, los 
planetas en la Sistema Solar no pueden continuar moviéndose en 
órbita alrededor alrededor del sol.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schwerkraft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bahn</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Planeten</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Solarsystem</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sonne</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">gravidade</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Órbita</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Planetas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">sistema solar</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">sol</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">gravità</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Orbita</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Pianeti</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">sistema solare</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">sole</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">βαρύτητα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τροχιά</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πλανήτες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ηλιακό σύστημα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ήλιος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Sistema Solar</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">sol</string>
          </keyword>
